Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express & #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lake Shore Drive/Division
ShortDescription: SB 146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Exp & 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Exp buses are rerouted via Outer Lake Shore Dr, North Ave & Inner Lake Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express & #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express  buses are temporarily rerouted via Outer Lake Shore Drive, North Ave & Inner Lake Shore Drive: due to, street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/Division.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
